department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 化學是探討物質的科學與其經歷的變化，而物理化學是化學的分支，是建立學科的原理，涵蓋物理概念與數學語言。這些概念用來解釋物質的物理與化學性質的變化，本課程將學習物理化學原理，將其應用於生命科學與醫學，除了專業知識講授，更加入團隊討論，以了解生命進行的獨特過程。
goal.en:
"Chemistry is the science of matter and the changes it can undergo. Physical chemistry is the branch of chemistry that establishes and develops the principles of the subject in terms of the underlying concepts of physics and the language of mathematics. Its concepts are used to explain and interpret observations on the physical and chemical properties of matter.
This text develops the principles of physical chemistry and their applications to the study of the life sciences, particularly biochemistry and medicine. The resulting combination of the concepts and physics, chemistry, and biology into an intricate mosaic leads to a unique and exciting understanding of the processes responsible for life."

outline.ch:
"Week 1: Introduction to Physical Chemistry
Week 2: Biochemical thermodynamics: The First Law
Week 3: Biochemical thermodynamics: The Second Law I
Week 4: Biochemical thermodynamics: The Second Law II
Week 5: Biochemical thermodynamics: Phase Equilibria
Week 6: Biochemical thermodynamics: Phase Equilibria II
Week 7: Midterm exam I
Week 8: Biochemical thermodynamics: Thermodynamics of ion and electron transport I
Week 9: Biochemical thermodynamics: Thermodynamics of ion and electron transport II
Week 10: Midterm exam II
Week 11: The kinetics and life processes: The Rates of Reactions I
Week 12: The kinetics and life processes: The Rates of Reactions II
Week 13: The kinetics and life processes: Accounting for the Rate Laws I
Week 14: The kinetics and life processes: Accounting for the Rate Laws II
Week 15: The kinetics and life processes: Complex Biochemical Processes I
Week 16: The kinetics and life processes: Complex Biochemical Processes II
Week 17: Biomolecular structures
Week 18: Final Exam"
outline.en:
"Week 1: Introduction to Physical Chemistry
Week 2: Biochemical thermodynamics: The First Law
Week 3: Biochemical thermodynamics: The Second Law I
Week 4: Biochemical thermodynamics: The Second Law II
Week 5: Biochemical thermodynamics: Phase Equilibria
Week 6: Biochemical thermodynamics: Phase Equilibria II
Week 7: Midterm exam I
Week 8: Biochemical thermodynamics: Thermodynamics of ion and electron transport I
Week 9: Biochemical thermodynamics: Thermodynamics of ion and electron transport II
Week 10: Midterm exam II
Week 11: The kinetics and life processes: The Rates of Reactions I
Week 12: The kinetics and life processes: The Rates of Reactions II
Week 13: The kinetics and life processes: Accounting for the Rate Laws I
Week 14: The kinetics and life processes: Accounting for the Rate Laws II
Week 15: The kinetics and life processes: Complex Biochemical Processes I
Week 16: The kinetics and life processes: Complex Biochemical Processes II
Week 17: Biomolecular structures
Week 18: Final Exam"

textbook.ch: 物理化學 (Atkins : The Elements Of Physical Chemistry 2/E)，姜仁章、曾慧娟、楊敏智、田福助、林蓉蓀、吳鎰州　編譯，ISBN :9789575846831
textbook.en:
"1. Elements of Physical Chemistry 7/E, Peter William Atkins & Julio De Paula, Oxford University Press, ISBN：9780198796701
2. Physical Chemistry 2/E, David W. Ball, Cengage Learning, ISBN：9781285969770
3. Physical Chemistry 3/E, Thomas Engel & Philip Reid, Pearson, ISBN：9781292022246"

ch.competencies: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
